name: Door and Window Moldings
description: High-density EPS decorative moldings with flexible coating, ideal for aesthetic finishing of doors and windows, with easy installation and customization.

specifications.material: Virgin EPS with polymeric resin coating
specifications.aplicacao: Internal and external doors and windows

hero.title: Door and Window Moldings
hero.description: Elegant solutions for finishing doors and windows, combining aesthetics, lightness and resistance.

categoryDescription.title: Isoart Door and Window Moldings elevate the aesthetics of internal and external environments with lightness and durability.
categoryDescription.description: Isoart Door and Window Moldings are manufactured in high-density EPS with flexible polymeric resin-based coating, ensuring smooth finishing, weather resistance and ease of installation. Customizable, they are ideal for architectural projects that seek refinement, speed in application and low structural impact, serving residences, offices and commercial buildings.

benefits.title: Customizable aesthetics
benefits.description: Various models and finishes to match any project.

benefits.title: Lightness and easy installation
benefits.description: Reduces costs and construction time with simple fixing via AC-3 mortar.

benefits.title: Weather resistance
benefits.description: Ideal for external use, with protection against temperature variations.

generalCharacteristics: Flexible coating with polymeric resin and mineral powders
Smooth surface, free from cement darkening

applications.title: Sophisticated finishing for doors and windows in residential and commercial projects
applications.description: Isoart Door and Window Moldings are perfect for internal and external finishing, providing elegance and customization. With quick installation and weather resistance, they are ideal for residences, offices and commercial facades, valuing aesthetics without overloading the structure.

tabDescriptions.Aesthetics and customization: Produced to measure, moldings allow various finishes (masses, textures, paintings) to serve customized architectural projects, ensuring a sophisticated look.
tabDescriptions.Quick installation: Fixing with AC-3 adhesive mortar and, for larger moldings, wooden dowels, ensures speed, practicality and cleanliness in construction, reducing costs.
tabDescriptions.Resistance and durability: High-density EPS and flexible coating resist sudden temperature and humidity variations, ideal for external use without cracks or drying.
tabDescriptions.Sustainability: 100% recyclable and CFC-free, Isoart moldings are environmentally responsible.
